Caption: Dr. h. c. Heinrich Luebke, President of the Federal Republic of Germany, addresses the audience
Description: From left: Mr. Raja Gopalan (Wearing white suit in background), Prof. B. Sengupto (wearing white suit and black tie), Mr. Y. S. Ramaswami, Dr. h. c. Heinrich Luebke (addressing audience), and Mr. R. Natarajan at the event. In his address, Dr. Heinrich Luebke stressed the success that was born out of the co-operation between the two countries and their governments. He quoted a line by Mahatma Gandhi 'Knowledge will be the common property of the people', and went on to say that "The stone which I now have the honour to lay should be a constant reminder of this task to us and to all who teach and study in this Institute."
